channel.title: project on Thomas Wilson
channel.description: Recent content in project on Thomas Wilson

item.title: My Top Albums of 2020
item.description: Just a quick blog post to highlight that I’ve published my 2020 Top Albums of the Year. You can find it here. Seriously, go check it out. I really enjoy making little specially art-directed pages like this. It feels very “this is what the internet was made for”. It’s just a quirky little bespoke designed page which oozes my love for music. No tracking, no adverts, just a quirky font and cool colour scheme.
